segments.text: I am surprised by how calm the woman looks while drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool looks wobbly, and I feel a bit anxious watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, her hand raised towards the jar, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the open window above the sink, letting in light that contrasts with the indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy seeing the children's mischief, it reminds me of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focus on the plate is almost comical given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around soon and sees the children and the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR
